scripts.prepublishOnly: npm test && npm run build && npm run gh-demo && npm run gh-doc
scripts.test: npm run lint && CJS_ONLY=1 npm run build && c8 --exclude dist --exclude test -r text -r html -r lcov mocha && node support/specsplit.mjs
scripts.benchmark-deps: npm install --prefix benchmark/extra/ -g marked@0.3.6 commonmark@0.26.0 markdown-it/markdown-it.git#2.2.1
scripts.gh-demo: npm run demo && gh-pages -d demo -f -b master -r git@github.com:markdown-it/markdown-it.github.io.git
scripts.specsplit: support/specsplit.mjs good -o test/fixtures/commonmark/good.txt && support/specsplit.mjs bad -o test/fixtures/commonmark/bad.txt && support/specsplit.mjs

scripts.coverage: npm run test && nyc report --reporter html
